channel.title: Work at PayFunc on CardFunc
channel.description: Recent content in Work at PayFunc on CardFunc

item.title: Junior Full Stack Engineer
item.description: As a Junior Full Stack Engineer you will be a part of our growing development team. You will be involved in both backend and front end development.

item.title: Junior UX Specialist
item.description: As a Junior User Experience Specialist you will be a part of our growing development team. Your work will be focused on improving the usabilibty of our products.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer with Payments Expertice
item.description: As a Senior Software Engineer with Payments Expertice you will be a key part of growing our development team. Not only will you be an individual contributer but you will also coach junior engineers to become more skilled and productive.

item.title: Junior iOS & Android Engineer
item.description: As a Junior iOS & Android Engineer you will be a part of our growing development team. You will be involved in building and maintaining SDK:s for Android and iOS.

item.title: Thank You
item.description: Thank you for your application. We will contact you by email as soon as we have read your application.
